Name: Mortal Decay
About the game: You awaken, a survivor of world war III, you are starving, just trying to move forward. With your strength slowly fading, you make way into an abandon prison. Hopelessly you search for some food stored inside. During your hunt, you find out the prison is not as abandoned as you thought it was... You are being chased, your pursuers motives are unknown. With the little strength you have left, you are unable to fight, your only hope is to escape. Who are they, and what do they want with you? Why is the prison abandoned and what happened to those who inhabited it? Collect clues to the prisons past and learn about the tragedies of those who lived there. Stealth-based mechanics to sneak around enemies Expansive and detailed environments Multiple enemies with unique AI Immersive and horrifying story Chilling sound design Can you make it out alive?
Meta Title: Mortal Decay: Oct 28, 2020, Roger Kaffer and Full Overview
